abstract: Returns a representation of an image from the specified data in the PICT file format.
overview:
## Return Value

An initialized [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPICTImageRep], or `nil` if the object could not be initialized. Initialization may fail if the data does not conform to the PICT file format.

## Discussion

If the PICT data is obtained directly from a PICT file or document, this method ignores most of the 512-byte header that occurs before the start of the actual picture data. It may retrieve some relevant meta information from the header.

# init(data:)

**Initializer**

Returns a representation of an image from the specified data in the PICT file format.

## Declaration

```swift
init?(data pictData: Data)
```

## Parameters

- **pictData**: A data object containing the PICT data.

## Return Value

An initialized [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPICTImageRep], or `nil` if the object could not be initialized. Initialization may fail if the data does not conform to the PICT file format.

## Discussion

If the PICT data is obtained directly from a PICT file or document, this method ignores most of the 512-byte header that occurs before the start of the actual picture data. It may retrieve some relevant meta information from the header.

## Related Documentation

- **pictRepresentation**: The image representation’s PICT data.
